BilderBox - The heart of the Bilder family

BilderBox houses all of the Bilder famliy as well as storage and processing power.

Straightforward imports

Quickly add all of your existing photos to BilderBox, regardless of how you store them now.

Storage at your fingertips

Your photos stay local in your BilderBox. Simply connect it to home WiFi to access your library anywhere.

State-of-the-art backups

BilderBox is equipped with two drives with a mirrored filesystem. They are also user exchangable.

BilderBook - Digital photo album

BilderBook combines the best of the digital and analog worlds

Beautiful layouts

Pick up your BilderBook at any time to enjoy a randomly selected photo collection, displayed in a beautiful, premade layout.

Ingenious hinge design

10 flexible, ulrathin OLED screens make BilderBook possible. Enclosed in an ingenious hinge.

Choose your collections

Want to view a specific collection in BilderBook? No problem, just choose it in the app and get going.

BilderBeam - Mini photo projector

Show the your photos in big-picture style with BilderBeam.

Hassle-free slide shows

Quick set up, ultra-portable, 3h battery life on a charge. What more do you need to enjoy your photos with friends?

Adjustable lens

No matter where you place BilderBeam, you always get the best picture. This little slider lets you control the angle of projection.

Always in control

When projecting photos with BilderBeam, choose which collections or photos to show with BilderApps from your favorite device.

BilderScan - portable photo scanner

The most efficient way to digitize your photos.

Scan prints & albums

BilderScan allows you to quickly scan your printed photos. Just swipe the scanner over any photo print or album and the scanned photos will appear in your library instantly.

Negatives & Slides

Get high quality scans of your negatives and slides with the film scan rack. Supports 35mm negative and posititve film.

Silde it through

After loading the film scan rack, just slide it through the scan slot in BilderBox. Scanned photos will be added to your library.

Tired of cluttered photo libraries?

Buy your BilderBox now and get an exclusive Early-Bird offer.
